name: X50Q
description: A smart keyboard for professionals who also like gaming and winning. Fastest Gamma Zulu switches, gaming look and palm rest.

name: 5QS
description: The second generation of the 5Q keyboard, the only smart RGB mechanical keyboard with built-in RGB profiles and macros. Fastest mechanical switches with 100M lifecycle and ultra-bright RGB lighting.

name: 4Q
description: The smart Das Keyboard with Cherry MX RGB switches. Iconic design, aluminum top panel, built-in USB hub.

name: 4 PROFESSIONAL
description: An expression of refinement and a premium typing experience, the DasKeyboard 4 Professional features dedicated media controls, a machined volume knob, a two-port 3.0 SuperSpeed hub, and an anodized aluminum top panel.
specs: Cherry MX mechanical key switches with gold contacts
Dedicated media control with oversized volume knob
Two-port USB 3.0 SuperSpeed hub - Up to 5Gb/s, 10x the speed of USB 2.0 (Two-port USB 2.0 hub for Das Keyboard 4 root models)
Instant sleep button to save energy
Laser etched key inscriptions
Bumps on F and J keys (home keys)
104-key US layout, 105-key for UK, NO, and DE layouts
Outside the US? Click here for information on where to buy
Footbar to raise keyboard also functions as a ruler (youâ€™ll thank us later)
Extra long 6.5 ft (201 cm) USB cable with single USB type-A connector (Braided cable for Das Keyboard 4 root models)
Dimensions: 18 x 6.8 x .80 inches (45.72 x 17.272 x 2.032 cm)
Elevated height: 1.2 inches (3.1 cm)
Weight: 2.9 lbs (1.3 kg)
NKRO over USB for faster gaming, programming, or anything that makes you a formidable opponent in work or play
Anodized aluminum top panel
Firmware updatable
System requirements:
PC Windows, Linux
One USB 1.1., 2.0 or 3.0 port
No driver required

name: 4 ULTIMATE
description: For the expert typist desiring ultimate sleekness, the stealthy DasKeyboard 4 Ultimate has blank keys, dedicated media controls, a machined volume knob, a two-port 3.0 SuperSpeed hub, and an anodized aluminum top panel.

name: 4 PROFESSIONAL FOR MAC
description: Designed for Mac compatibility, this premium finish mechanical keyboard features dedicated media controls, a machined volume knob, a two-port 3.0 SuperSpeed hub, and an anodized aluminum top panel.

name: 4C TKL
description: Sleek tenkeyless design with PBT keycaps and Cherry MX Brown switches will help you type faster. Enjoy the pleasing ultra-modern design piece sitting at your workstation.

name: PRIME 13
description: Need simple, high quality minimalist design? The Das Keyboard Prime 13, with its white LED backlighting and anodized aluminum top panel, is for you.

name: MODEL S PROFESSIONAL
description: Need simple, high quality minimalist design? The Das Keyboard Prime 13, with its white LED backlighting and anodized aluminum top panel, is for you.

name: MODEL S PROFESSIONAL FOR MAC
description: Need a Model S designed for Mac compatibility? The Das Keyboard Model S Professional for Mac, featuring a two-port USB 2.0 Hi-Speed hub and glossy black top panel, is for you.
